metadata.name: The Astronaut's Lover - Artserge x Lucarduca
metadata.description:
Exquisite Corpse collaboration with the artist Lucarduca.
I drew the left half, covered except for a small strip and send to Luca, to finish the right half.

About 30 hours on my half, and it was loosley inspired by the book Solaris.

I love working with Luca, he is so good at reading the exposed strip and weaving it into his incredible drawings.

Ink on paper 30x30 cm.
